column10: I feel like 80% of students get a 60% or better is a bit low?
If goals were met, then I'm not sure what changes need to be made. But is 50% (the average) what we want to shoot for?
Only 50% of seniors havng presented their work seems like a low threshold.
Just giving a presentation does not mean they have learned to do it well.
Criteria was met in some, but not all. Assessment of results, still ongoing.
Hard to evaluate because not clear what changes will be made.
The major is in flux, so it is not clear that the current statements about assessment are valid.
Very detailed responses on a class-by-class basis!
